STATLOCK_VERSION_HEADER.purpose: Standardize ingestion of NCAA FBS team rosters from Ourlads for modeling and props.

FIELDS.name: team_name
FIELDS.desc: Official team name as rendered on Ourlads roster page.

FIELDS.name: conference
FIELDS.desc: Conference of the program at time of scrape.

FIELDS.name: stadium
FIELDS.desc: Stadium name and capacity when listed on Ourlads.

FIELDS.name: surface
FIELDS.desc: Playing surface as listed on team roster page.

FIELDS.name: head_coach
FIELDS.desc: Head coach as listed under team info.

FIELDS.name: updated_at
FIELDS.desc: Timestamp text shown as 'Updated' on the roster page.

FIELDS.name: jersey
FIELDS.desc: Jersey number; keep as string to preserve leading zeros if any.

FIELDS.name: height
FIELDS.desc: Height as displayed; often in scouts-style inches (e.g., 6020 = 6'2").

FIELDS.name: source_url
FIELDS.desc: Roster page URL used for parsing.

UNIQUENESS_NOTES: Duplicate player names may appear across seasons/programs; include source_url in PK for uniqueness.
QUALITY_CHECKS: Drop rows with missing player_name or pos.
Normalize whitespace; trim commas and extra spaces.
If jersey contains non-numeric characters, keep as-is (string).
Keep height as raw string; a separate transform can convert to inches.
TRANSFORM_NOTES: Create derived fields later: height_in, bmi (requires height parse), class_bucket (FR/SO/JR/SR).
Conference realignment is fluid; store as of scrape date in a separate table if needed.
LICENSE_NOTES: Use Ourlads data for academic research; respect site terms and robots directives.
CONTACT: Maintainer: StatLock v2 (for Zynda PhD project)
